name: Green Team Wins
description: A team-based party game where you work together to achieve victory. Perfect for large groups!

name: Sagrada
description: Beautifully craft stained glass windows by drafting colored dice and building patterns.

name: Concordia
description: Trade goods across the Roman Empire and build trading empires in this economic strategy game.

name: Graft
description: Build and cultivate botanical collections in this elegant set collection game.

name: Grimoire
description: Cast spells and manage your magical library in this strategic card game.

name: Forbidden Island
description: Work together to escape a sinking island and recover treasures before it's too late.

name: Viceroy
description: Build your own medieval nation through strategic card play and resource management.

name: Night Parade
description: Navigate a magical festival of spirits in this charming and strategic game.

name: A Place For All My Books
description: Organize your library with style and strategy in this cozy, relaxing puzzle game.

name: Hidden Leaders
description: Uncover your opponents' hidden identities while trying to hide your own in this deduction game.

name: Skyjo
description: Race to lowest score by playing cards strategically in this fast-paced card game.

name: Point Salad
description: Pick vegetables and score points in this fast, accessible party game.

name: Mantis
description: Command your insect army to victory in this tactical combat game.
